data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Constantinescu, Ioana Cristina, Popa, Oana Paula, Popa, Luis Ovidiu, Cobzaru, Ioana, B., Mukhim D. Khlur, Adam, Costică (2018): A new feather mite species of the genus Trouessartia Canestrini, 1899 (Acarina, Trouessartiidae) - an integrative description (morphology and DNA barcoding data). ZooKeys 789: 19-35, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.789.27829, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.789.27829
